Name: Sharp Eyed
About the game: Set in the wild west, you are a bounty hunter out for the rewards. Your task is to eliminate the monsters that has recently appeared. But there is a catch. In each level you find yourself in a small area. Your opponent is somewhere there but does not reveal itself visually. Therefore, you must track it down by listening for the sound it emits when you are close. When you have located it, you shoot, before it attacks. Set out on a quest in 30, short, hunter vs hunter levels, where you will duel these beasts across multiple different maps, and eventually eliminate the source for good. Headphones strongly recommended.
